---
title: UnnecessaryStaticImport
summary: Using static imports for types is unnecessary
layout: bugpattern
category: JDK
severity: SUGGESTION
---

## The problem
Using static imports for types is unnecessary, since they can always be replaced by equivalent non-static imports.
